page.title: 01GENERAL
page.content: Our area is the original part of Kirkcaldy with at least seven twelfths of the area covered by sea. The area has the busiest shopping area including the new Mercat shopping centre. It takes in six of the main industries in our town. Our area has a lot of entertainments; two discotheques, a cinema, bingo and amusement arcades. Our area has two harbours, Dysart and Kirkcaldy on the coast of the Firth of Forth. The Links Market comes in April. It is the longest and oldest street fair in Europe. The area takes in Ravenscraig Castle and Park. Along at Dysart is Pan Ha', a number of houses recently renovated by the National Trust. On the whole our area is a mixed one with shopping, industries, residential, parkland, sea and wasteland all in different parts of the area.
